message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but still leaving you with a decent amount
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! I'm not giving up 80% of the money so easily.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to keep a bit more for myself.
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you a small amount to keep the game going
That's still a pretty small amount for me, Bob. I'm not giving up 90% of the money.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I'd like to keep a bit more for myself. Let's meet in the middle!
I'll take a big share, but I'll give you a tiny bit to keep the game going, and hope you'll reconsider
That's still a very small amount for me, Bob. I'm not giving up 95% of the money, no matter how small the amount I get.
I'm willing to give you a big share, but I'd like to keep a bit more for myself. Let's try to find a middle ground!
I'll take most of the money, but I'll give you a tiny bit to make it worth your while
That's an insult, Bob! I'm not giving up 98% of the money for a paltry $200. I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair split.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a significant share, but I need to keep something for myself. Let's try to wrap this up!
I'll take almost all of it, but I'll give you a tiny bit to make it worth your while
That's it, Bob. I'm not giving up 99% of the money for a laughable $100. I'm not going to let you walk all over me like this. I'll make one final offer, and if you reject it, I'm done.
This is my last offer, Bob. I'm giving you the majority of the money, but I need to keep something for myself. Let's end this game with some dignity.
I'll take almost all of it, but I'll give you the last 10 bucks to make it a memorable ending
Fine, Bob. You win. I'll take the $10 and we can finally end this game. Congratulations, I suppose.
